r.d: Modyllic, PHP SQL Parser and schema management tool
r.n: * Stop Modyllic_Parser::partial from having a return value * Complain if no toschema is provided to sqldiff * Fix a --progress divide by zero when the source file was empty * Fix bug where a DROP DATABASE would ignore any following CREATEs * Make the SQL generator able to only output specific kinds of data * Boolean types were being treated as exactly equivalent to TINYINT and this isn't actually the case * displayError should really be a static function * Fix migration --create option * Fix bugs around when SQLMETA is created * Add support for MySQL Triggers * Fix view changeset handling
